DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the efficacy and safety of two new patterns of controlled ovarian hyperstimulation (defined as total number of picked up eggs). This study will be performed in egg donors but these new patterns will be implemented in fertility preservation patients.
DOC.brief_title: A Comparative Study of Two Patterns of Controlled Ovarian Hyperstimulation in Mid Follicular Phase or Early Luteal Phase for Egg Donors
DOC.criteria: premenopausal women 1830 years old, with FSH levels < 10mIU irregular menstrual cycle BMI between 1228 signed inform consent Polycystic ovarian syndrome, gonadotropins allergy
